title: Pair of jeans
description:
Average carbon footprint of the production and transportation of a 1 kg pair of cotton jeans, assuming a transoceanic shipment from Thailand to Europe or the US, and 200 km of transportation over land in a truck.

The calculation does not include the use phase of the clothing (washing and drying), nor does it include the disposal (recycling, downcycling, or landfilling).
